title: 品葱建站以来一百多天,高票内容汇总(品葱游戏币作为评价指标)
contents:
数据来源(24号以前)
https://github.com/pin-cong/data/blob/master/pink.sql
# 现在自己查很方便了，跟我这个效果一样，复制粘贴就行
https://pincongbot.github.io/Pincong-SQL/

得品葱币前100名的答案


select

agree_count||","||thanks_count as "赞同,感谢数",

(add_time-1541639342)/3600/24 as 距品葱建站天数,

substr(answer_content,0,50)||"..." as 内容,

question_id as 问题地址

from aws_answer

order by agree_count+5*thanks_count

desc limit 100;



得品葱币前100名的文章


select

votes||","||thanks_count as "赞同,感谢数",

(add_time-1541639342)/3600/24 as 距品葱建站天数,

substr(message,0,50)||"..." as 内容,

id as 文章地址

from aws_article

order by votes+5*thanks_count

desc limit 100;




赞同数前50的问题


select agree_count,question_id,question_content from aws_question

order by agree_count desc

limit 50;




回答数前50的问题


select answer_count,question_id,question_content from aws_question

order by answer_count desc

limit 50;



浏览次数，十大


select views,'article/'||id as url ,substr(title,0,50) as content from aws_article

UNION ALL

select view_count, 'question/'||question_id,substr(question_content,0,50) from aws_question

order by views desc

limit 10


# user就不发了,大家都有印象,不过民吁日报的回答和文章为什么看不到多少
# 靠人工判断答案价值的日后再发,并且需要多人协作
# 要编辑文章请留言,
